channel.title: Npc help
channel.description:
I posted this in client help aswell, becuz i think its on the same page of my problem, it could be server or client errored
heres my problem: ----------------------------- I made my NPC clickable in class5.java
when i compiled and logged on i right clicked him and he was clickable, but he's not even on the map as an NPC, and when I gave him the if NPCID command for a teleport I clicked him and it didnt work =P
i did all of the above in my client files ------------------------------ is there something im doing wrong? how do I make him a npc in my server or client, he's clickable but its like he doesnt exsist.
why doesnt my npc work?

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

I posted this in client help aswell, becuz i think its on the same page of my problem, it could be server or client errored

heres my problem:

I made my NPC clickable in class5.java

when i compiled and logged on i right clicked him and he was clickable, but he’s not even on the map as an NPC, and when I gave him the if NPCID command for a teleport I clicked him and it didnt work =P

i did all of the above in my client files

is there something im doing wrong? how do I make him a npc in my server or client, he’s clickable but its like he doesnt exsist.

why doesnt my npc work?
